forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High near 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low around 45F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
